kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: User Should Be Able To Add Product through text file

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${TextFile} = Veirdo Oversized | Loose Fit | Relaxed Fit | Wide Fit 100% Cotton Half Sleeves Smile Printed T-Shirt for Mens/Boys_Chest_40 u.s. polo assn. men's regular fit t-shirt_Length_27.5

kw.name: Split String
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.
kw.msg: ${List} = ['Veirdo Oversized | Loose Fit | Relaxed Fit | Wide Fit 100% Cotton Half Sleeves Smile Printed T-Shirt for Mens/Boys_Chest_40', "u.s. polo assn. men's regular fit t-shirt_Length_27.5"]

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
